Desc.entry: Part of Family Action Sheffield, a registered charity. Offers home visits to parents following a diagnosis of ADHD. Referrals from CAMHS, Ryegate or parents can self-refer. Gives an information pack on the condition and services available. Runs a managing ADHD group which runs for 10 weeks and offers different strategies for managing the condition. Can offer awareness-raising presentations to professionals working with children as well as visiting parents groups. Aims to offer family support within the home for a period of 8 weeks, referral via MAST (Multi Agency Support Teams) or MAAN only.
